name: Star Wars
overview: Star Wars place the player in an X-Wing fighter and must fight TIE fighters of the Galactic Empire. The player needs to destroy as many as possible before time runs out or ammo depletes. The game uses a first person view with a set of crosshairs, TIE fighters can enter the screen from each corner. The player has 90 seconds and 25 rounds and only direct hits destroy the TIE fighters.
